game.name: Old Macdonald Farm
game.description:
You are the owner of the Old Macdonald Farm where multiple types of animals live. Some cute kids also reside with you. Being a responsible parent and a caring person, you have decided to make some experiments at your farm. But, the problem is that you are not sufficient enough to handle this job on your own. For this reason, you have approached your friend to get some support. Luckily, your friend has got convinced and got ready to guide you during your farm adventure.  

Old Macdonald Farm Adventure is a wonderful animal girl where both entertainment and education exist in a greater proportion. You as a player have to perform multiple things like greeting the farmer, interacting with the chicken, greeting the horse at the barn stable, playing with the farm pig, dropping the sheep onto the barn roof and moving the cow. The best part about this brand new girls game is that there is no objective to complete.  

All you need to do is just make the farm roam free for your kids and allow them to express their creativity at the optimum possible level. You should not miss it out especially if your kids enjoy singing the old macdonald song or want to get them educated in a friendly and funny environment.  They get familiar with different kinds of animals, vegetables and fruits while finding a perfect platform to develop their mind. Encourage your kids to try out such more animal puzzles to test their memory skills and have fun without download atmegame.com!
